item.title: The Saint's Rise
item.description: 06:44 Monday 13 November 2017 JST I’ve been reading Michael John Grist’s most recent book, The Sant’s Rise. It’s a trimmed-down re-write of his first book, a book I’ve read before, but now he is coming at it with +10 EXP or so.
